conbody.p: executorsHDFS File MetadataHDFS File Metadata executoroverviewThe HDFS File Metadata executor changes file metadata for closed files in each time it receives a file closure event record. Use the HDFS File Metadata executor as part of an event stream.

The HDFS File Metadata executor can change the following file metadata:
File name
File location
File owner and group
File permissions
Access control lists (ACLs)
When you configure the HDFS File Metadata executor, you configure an expression that represents the location and name of the file to process, and the changes you want to perform.
You can also configure the executor to generate events for another event stream. For more information about event handling, see .
